title: Incredible Arcade Sona fan art

embed.description: Patreon | Tumblr | Facebook I want to start doing some more League art, starting with this! I'm really glad I decided to do something so colourful; Daughter of the...

replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=lhgEiig4,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-11-03T22:01:08.626+0000)
>
> Woah, this is awesome! ^-^

Hey!

Just passed this onto my girlfriend (the artist)

She really appreciates the feedback :)
Arcade Sona is my favorite skin in the game, so this made my day!

> [{quoted}](name=MoonMoon95,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=lhgEiig4,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2015-11-04T00:57:43.555+0000)
>
> That's a nice rack.

This.

Also I wish Sona  wasn't terrible so I could play her in ranked.
